entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
